mapper.select: SELECT a.id as groupAuthId, a.group_id as groupId, b.group_name as groupName, b.group_code as groupCode, a.api_id as apiId, c.api_name as apiName, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime from t_group_auth a LEFT JOIN t_group b ON a.group_id = b.group_id LEFT JOIN t_api_resource c on a.api_id = c.api_id where a.group_id = #{groupId}
select api_name from t_api_resource where api_id = #{apiId}
